info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 4:57PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Otero County through 530 PM MDT... At 457 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles south of Cloudcroft. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sunspot, Benson Ridge, Cox Canyon and Bluff Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
